name: Youda Safari
description:
** 33% Discount! **

It’s a big-game game!

Give all the tourists a once in their lifetime holiday experience! You are in charge of the safari parks all over the world. It’s up to you to take care of these wildlife enthusiasts and eager safari tourists.

Guide them past crazy monkeys, rebellious rhinos and hilarious hippos, mind the lions in the way and look for many more wicked wildlife animals in this lovely game park game!
Choose the best photo moments, find these special rare and shy animals and upgrade your parks with new vehicles, bigger tourist facilities, restaurants and other services. Provide your guests with the best guidance tour and the best wildlife adventure they could wish for!

Youda Safari is a very charming and highly addictive time management game.

Features:
• 6 different safari parks
• 70 exciting levels
• Lots of upgrades
• Strategic decision making and great action
• Great mix of fast paced action and great fun
• Nice surprises and miraculous moments
• Beautiful scenery
• Funny, charming and enjoyable animals
• and above all… a challenging wild adventure!

This game contains the following languages:
EN / DE / FR / NL / ES / IT / JP / RU / SV / PT / LV / PL

Enjoy Youda Games at: www.youdagames.com
